pages.text: In $(sorcerycraft), $(spells) are split between several types, allowing a wide range of use case for each crafted spell. $(br2)The $(bold)Spell Type$() is shown on the tooltip of each spell scroll when hovered. $(br2)The $(book) also provides information on the Spell Type on each $(spells) page.

$(bold)➜ Self Use:$() The spell is cast on the caster themself, allowing them to apply different effects on their character. $(br2)$(bold)➜ Projectile:$() The spell creates a projectile orb being cast towards a target. $(br2)$(bold)➜ Multi Type:$() The spell, by default, is cast towards a target. If you sneak, the effect(s) of the spell can be applied to the caster themself.
